title: Part One: Jack Idema: The War On Terror's Dumbest Grifter
itunes:title: Part One: Jack Idema: The War On Terror's Dumbest Grifter
description:
Robert is joined by Danl Goodman to discuss Jack Idema, the greatest conman of The Afghan War.


Footnotes:

  8. Freelance Terrorist Hunter
  9. Tin Soldier
  10. Convicted Torturer, Vigilante in Mexican Stand-Off
